name: Introduction
description: Learn what the Network Programmability Video Course is all about.

lessons.name: How to be a Network Engineer in a Programmable Age
lessons.description: Explore how the network has evolved from the early "Stone Age" to today and what it means to you as a Network Engineer.

name: Programming Fundamentals
description: Jumpstart your journey into Network Programmability with this quick introduction to the core programming fundamental topics you'll explore.

lessons.name: Data Formats: Understanding and using JSON, XML and YAML
lessons.description: Become familiar with the three most common data formats in network programmability.

lessons.name: APIs are Everywhere... but what are they?
lessons.description: Demystify the term "API" and learn about the most common types you'll need to know.

lessons.name: REST APIs Part 1: HTTP is for more than Web Browsing
lessons.description: Learn what makes up a REST API and how to get started using them.

sandbox.description: The "NETCONF/YANG and RESTCONF on IOS XE" Always On Sandbox provides an environment to developers and network engineers to test their applications or scripts that use model driven programmability using the new standard device interfaces for network configuration and operations.
sandbox.name: NETCONF-YANG and RESTCONF AO

lessons.name: REST APIs Part 2: Making REST API Calls with Postman
lessons.description: Become a REST API Pro with the Postman Application.

sandbox.description: This Lab is running the GA Release of APIC-EM which provides the developer the ability to design, develop and test utilizing the APIC-EM development platform with a sample simulated sandbox Lab Topology and Hello World application.
sandbox.name: APIC-EM Always-On

lessons.name: Python Part 1: Python Language and Script Basics
lessons.description: Python is all the rage for network programmability but why?  And how can you get started?

lessons.name: Python Part 2: Working with Libraries and Virtual Environments
lessons.description: Continue your journey with Python with Libraries and Virtual Environments.

lessons.name: Python Part 3: Useful Python Libraries for Network Engineers
lessons.description: Jump into Python for Networking in this lesson where you'll learn some of the most useful libraries.

name: Network Device APIs
description: Network programmability is more than sending CLI with Python.  Learn about the latest in programmatic device interfaces in this module.

lessons.name: Getting the "YANG" of it with Standard Data Models
lessons.description: Do you keep hearing the word "YANG", but not sure what it's all about?  Learn it all in this lesson.

sandbox.description: The "NETCONF/YANG and RESTCONF on IOS XE" Always On Sandbox provides an environment to developers and network engineers to test their applications or scripts that use model driven programmability using the new standard device interfaces for network configuration and operations.
sandbox.name: NETCONF-YANG and RESTCONF AO

learning_labs.description: Understand what a Data Model is and what YANG provides for Network Management.
learning_labs.name: Introduction to YANG Data Modeling

lessons.name: Goodbye SNMP <hello> NETCONF!
lessons.description: Put those new YANG skills to work with NETCONF in this lesson.

sandbox.description: The "NETCONF/YANG and RESTCONF on IOS XE" Always On Sandbox provides an environment to developers and network engineers to test their applications or scripts that use model driven programmability using the new standard device interfaces for network configuration and operations.
sandbox.name: NETCONF-YANG and RESTCONF AO

learning_labs.description: Explore the key elements of the NETCONF Protocol and how to use it.
learning_labs.name: Introduction to the NETCONF Protocol

lessons.name: Learn to CRUD with GET, POST and DELETE using RESTCONF
lessons.description: Get started with the standard REST API for the network, RESTCONF

sandbox.description: The "NETCONF/YANG and RESTCONF on IOS XE" Always On Sandbox provides an environment to developers and network engineers to test their applications or scripts that use model driven programmability using the new standard device interfaces for network configuration and operations.
sandbox.name: NETCONF-YANG and RESTCONF AO

learning_labs.description: Explore the key elements of the RESTCONF Protocol and how to use it.
learning_labs.name: Introduction to the RESTCONF Protocol

lessons.name: NX-API Part 1: Get Started with APIs and Nexus
lessons.description: Explore NX-API CLI for quickly getting started programming Open NX-OS with your CLI skills.

sandbox.description: The Open NX-OS Sandbox provides a developer with an environment to design, develop and test applications in the NX-OS switch software. Using the Open NX-API enables the developer to create management and control plane applications for NX-OS based switch devices.
sandbox.name: Open NX-OS with Nexus 9K

learning_labs.description: Learn about NX-OS's programmability and automation capabilities.
learning_labs.name: Nexus OS Programmability and Automation Overview

learning_labs.description: Explore the robust API capabilities available with Open NX-OS.
learning_labs.name: Introduction to NX-API

lessons.name: NX-API Part 2: Dive into the Nexus Object Model
lessons.description: Move beyond the CLI with NX-API REST and explore the native data model for Open NX-OS

sandbox.description: The Open NX-OS Sandbox provides a developer with an environment to design, develop and test applications in the NX-OS switch software. Using the Open NX-API enables the developer to create management and control plane applications for NX-OS based switch devices.
sandbox.name: Open NX-OS with Nexus 9K

learning_labs.description: Take a deeper look at JSON-RPC, JSON, XML, and NX-API REST interfaces included with NX-API
learning_labs.name: Investigate NX-API Options and the NX-OS Object Model

name: Network Controllers
description: Explore what network controllers offer to Software Defined Networking.

lessons.name: Program your own DNA with APIC-EM APIs
lessons.description: See how quickly you can get started with Digital Network Architecture and APIC-EM Programmabilty.

sandbox.description: This Lab is running the GA Release of APIC-EM which provides the developer the ability to design, develop and test utilizing the APIC-EM development platform with a sample simulated sandbox Lab Topology and Hello World application.
sandbox.name: APIC-EM Always-On

learning_labs.description: The purpose of this learning lab is to understand the basics of the APIC-EM Northbound REST API. APIC-EM allows you to develop your own custom controller or add dynamic SDN functionality directly into your own applications.
learning_labs.name: APIC-EM APIs with Python: Part 1 - The Basics

lessons.name: Got SDN? Understanding the ACI Programmability Options
lessons.description: Application Centric Infrastructure is the SDN solution for the Data Center born with programmability in mind.  Checkout all the options available in this lesson.

sandbox.description: The ACI Sandbox provides a developer with an environment to design, develop and test using the ACI RESTful APIs over http/https with XML and JSON encodings.
sandbox.name: ACI Simulator AlwaysOn

learning_labs.description: Learn the basics of the APIC controller and interfaces, and issue basic commands using the API.
learning_labs.name: ACI Programmability Options

lessons.name: Network Control in the Cloud - Developing with Cisco Meraki
lessons.description: With Meraki, your network is controlled by the clouds, and it's fully programmable.  In this lesson see what APIs and options are available.

sandbox.description: The Meraki DevNet Sandbox provides a developer environment to experiment with the Cisco Meraki products, manage and monitor network devices using Meraki's Cloud based Management. All of Meraki's integration points are accessible allowing one to try using the Dashboard APIs, setting up a Captive Portal/Splash Page, and leveraging Meraki's Location Scanning in their application
sandbox.name: Meraki Always On

learning_labs.description: Getting started with the Meraki Dashboard API
learning_labs.name: Meraki Dashboard API

lessons.name: DNA APIs Part 1: Exploring APIC-EM Apps via API
lessons.description: Dive into the APIs for exploring your network inventory and traffic paths in this lesson on APIC-EM Application APIs.

sandbox.description: This Lab is running the GA Release of APIC-EM which provides the developer the ability to design, develop and test utilizing the APIC-EM development platform with a sample simulated sandbox Lab Topology and Hello World application.
sandbox.name: APIC-EM Always-On

learning_labs.description: Learn about the APIC-EM Path Trace APIs and REST Fundamentals using Python
learning_labs.name: APIC-EM APIs with Python: Part 2 - Path Trace

lessons.name: DNA APIs Part 2: Troubleshooting with APIC-EM Programmability
lessons.description: Put your API skills to work making troubleshooting simpler by crafting a Python script to do the heavy discovery work for you.

sandbox.description: This Lab is running the GA Release of APIC-EM which provides the developer the ability to design, develop and test utilizing the APIC-EM development platform with a sample simulated sandbox Lab Topology and Hello World application.
sandbox.name: APIC-EM Always-On

lessons.name: ACI Programmability Part 1: The ACI Object Model
lessons.description: Learn how the ACI Object Model is at the root of all programmatic interactions with ACI and explore it using built-in tools in this lesson.

sandbox.description: The ACI Sandbox provides a developer with an environment to design, develop and test using the ACI RESTful APIs over http/https with XML and JSON encodings.
sandbox.name: ACI Simulator AlwaysOn

learning_labs.description: Investigate the ACI REST API and the tools available to easily use it.
learning_labs.name: Peeling back the ACI API

lessons.name: ACI Programmability Part 2: Using the ACI Toolkit
lessons.description: See how the ACI Toolkit makes programming APIC with Python simple and straightforward.

sandbox.description: The ACI Sandbox provides a developer with an environment to design, develop and test using the ACI RESTful APIs over http/https with XML and JSON encodings.
sandbox.name: ACI Simulator AlwaysOn

learning_labs.description: Introduction to the ACI Toolkit, a set of Python utilities for interfacing with the APIC.
learning_labs.name: Introduction to ACI Toolkit

name: Application Hosting and the Network
description: The switches and routers in your network can do much more than just pass packets these days.  Edge or Fog computing is the next big thing, and in this module learn how Linux, Python and Containers can all be hosted at the edge.

lessons.name: Cloud to Fog: Why Host Apps in the Network
lessons.description: Trying to understand why you might want to run code and applications on the network devices?  This lesson breaks it down.

lessons.name: Linux at the Edge: Introduction to Guest Shell
lessons.description: Learn how Guest Shell provides a Linux environment on switches and routers where you can run applications, utilities, and scripts securely.

sandbox.description: The "IOS XE Programmability" Sandbox provides an environment where developers and network engineers can explore the programmability options available within IOS XE
sandbox.name: IOS XE Programmability

lessons.name: Python at the Edge: Super Charged Network Event Management
lessons.description: Building on Guest Shell, Python is now available on your network devices enabling all sorts of possiblities.  Check them out in this lesson!

sandbox.description: The "IOS XE Programmability" Sandbox provides an environment where developers and network engineers can explore the programmability options available within IOS XE
sandbox.name: IOS XE Programmability

lessons.name: Package, Deploy and Run Applications in the Network with IOx
lessons.description: Embrace Fog Computing for the Internet of Things and run business applications at the edge with Cisco IOx.

sandbox.description: The IOx Fog Director reservation based Lab provides a developer with an environment to deploy IOx applications on a simulated environment for Cisco IOx.
sandbox.name: IOx v1.4

learning_labs.description: Learn to build an IOx Application using the DevNet Sandbox.
learning_labs.name: Building an IOx Application

learning_labs.description: Learn to build an IOx Application with Docker using the DevNet Sandbox.
learning_labs.name: Building an IOx Application with Docker

name: NetDevOps
description: NetDevOps is about bringing the culture, tools, and best practices from DevOps to networking.  Get started with configuration management for the network in this module.

lessons.name: Configuration Management and the Network
lessons.description: Not sure what configuration management is, or how it relatest to the network?  No worries, we break it down in this lesson.

learning_labs.description: Overview of the configuration management solution space
learning_labs.name: Introduction to Configuration Management

lessons.name: Ansible Part 1: What you need to Get Started
lessons.description: Go from zero to your first playbook in this quickstart to Ansible.

sandbox.description: The Open NX-OS Sandbox provides a developer with an environment to design, develop and test applications with Open NX-OS switch software.
sandbox.name: Open NX-OS with Nexus 9Kv

learning_labs.description: Start your automation journey by learning the Ansible tool
learning_labs.name: Introduction to Ansible

lessons.name: Ansible Part 2: Using Ansible for Network Configuration
lessons.description: With the basics of Ansible and server management under your belt, it's time to move to the network and see how moderinize network configuration management.

sandbox.description: The Open NX-OS Sandbox provides a developer with an environment to design, develop and test applications with Open NX-OS switch software.
sandbox.name: Open NX-OS with Nexus 9Kv

learning_labs.description: Learn how to automate tasks using Ansible playbooks.
learning_labs.name: Using Ansible with NX-OS Devices

lessons.name: Ansible Part 3: Your Network As Code
lessons.description: See what is possible when you embrace NetDevOps and treat your "Network as Code" in this lesson.

sandbox.description: The Open NX-OS Sandbox provides a developer with an environment to design, develop and test applications with Open NX-OS switch software.
sandbox.name: Open NX-OS with Nexus 9Kv
